text: The 2015–16 AS Monaco FC season was the club's third season back in Ligue 1 since its promotion from Ligue 2 in 2013. Monaco participated in Ligue 1, the UEFA Champions League, the Coupe de France and the Coupe de la Ligue. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Reserve squad=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: ===Winter=== In: Out: ==Friendlies== ==Competitions== ===Ligue 1=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by match==== ====Matches==== ===Coupe de la Ligue=== ===Coupe de France=== ===UEFA Champions League=== ====Qualifying rounds==== ===== Third qualifying round ===== ===== Play-off round ===== === UEFA Europa League === ====Group stage==== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |- |colspan="14"|Players away from the club on loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players who appeared for Monaco no longer at the club: |} ===Goalscorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;
